textBeforeTable: News for the cable and broadband industry February 22, 2013 Reading this on a mobile device? Try our optimized mobile version here: http://r.smartbrief.com/resp/eljTCfbwocfCqWfZeXpc
textAfterTable: Eye on Video  Report: Half of new sets will be smart TVs by 2015 More than 1 in 4 TV sets shipped worldwide in 2012, or 66 million units, were smart TVs, Screen Digest has found. By 2015, the number is expected to reach 50% of TVs shipped, or 141 million units. However, many buyers of such sets have yet to use the advanced features, such as 3D. MediaPost Communications/MediaDailyNews (2/21)      Fanhattan bolsters app with Web-based video-search tool Fanhattan has added a Web portal to its original iPad application search tool for movie and TV content.
